entries.role: Graduate Research and Teaching Assistant, ECE Department
entries.description: Conducting research on ultrawide-bandgap semiconductor devices and assisting faculty members in carrying out teaching duties.
Taught and moderated core undergraduate courses and supported student learning through problem sessions, assessment, and mentoring.
Taught digital fundamentals and guided students through combinational and sequential circuit design concepts.
Covered circuit analysis techniques and helped students build strong fundamentals in DC/AC circuit behavior.
Taught analog electronics topics including amplifiers and operational amplifier circuit analysis and design.
Learning standard industry practices of VLSI. Designing an industry OP-AMP and writing a datasheet.
Learning the circuits and codes of multiple products of the company, e.g. Biometric Attendance, Smart Parking System.

entries.role: Instructor for GUI Design and Sensor Interfacing
